trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Peoria
There were no other sightings in Peoria on or around August 18th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out off the apartment balcony to the North. I had a strange feeling to look up into the night sky. I assumed it was an aircraft flying West to East over the valley. The object was strobing white - green - red in a rotating manner and stationary no L or R movement, no vertical movement. Estimating target about 3 miles away. It is about 2000 ft in the air west of the 101 in Peoria. I was disappointed it would not come closer. It slowly disappeared heading west.
Summary: UFO spotted West Valley Phoenix AZ
